articles.title: Philip Glass cancels Kennedy Center symphony premiere in protest of Trump’s leadership - AP News
articles.description: Prize-winning composer Philip Glass has canceled the world premiere of his symphony about Abraham Lincoln at the Kennedy Center. Glass' Symphony No. 15, titled "Lincoln," was set to be conducted by Grammy winner Karen Kamensek on June 12 and 13. Glass stated …
